name: com.arandra.gsheet-to-data
description: Unity Editor tooling that pulls structured Google Sheet data through Google APIs and materializes strongly-typed ScriptableObjects.

samples.description: Preset configuration that mirrors the FieldTransform sheet (ID: 1_2Y3BtltwsyXTovWuWV6J32x_Ebe2Sy8vybGNhzkIsM) and demonstrates table exports.
Preset configuration for the InitConst sheet to walk through CONST exports and ScriptableObject generation.
